de.systemagmbh.components.logger
Class ASysLogger

java.lang.Object
  de.systemagmbh.components.logger.ASysLogger
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISysComponent, ISysDevelopmentLogSwitch, ISysGlobal, ISysLog, ISysLogConstants, ISysLogger
Direct Known Subclasses:
CSysDefaultLogger
Deprecated. As of release 2.5, replaced by de.systemagmbh.tools.logger.ASysLogger

public abstract class ASysLogger
extends Object
implements ISysLogger, ISysLogConstants

The ASysLogger is an abstract implementation of the interface ISysLogger. The get and set methods of the ISysLogger are implemented here. Also the methods of ISysComponent are implemented except getComponentName and getComponentVersion.

Version:
$Revision: 1.24 $
Author:
Udo Friedrich, Torsten Knauft

setLogWriter

public void setLogWriter(ISysLogWriter logWriter)
Deprecated. 
Set the class that is used for writing the log.

Parameters:
logWriter - The logger will call the ISysLogWriter-method writeLog() to write the log. The ISysLogWriter may write it to a file, the screen and so on.
